name: df-algext
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(calgext, copab(s0, s1, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfldext, cv(s1)), wral(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wrex(s3, cfv(cpl1, cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(cfv(ce1, cv(s3)), cv(s2)), cfv(c0g, cv(s0))))))))
comment: Definition of the algebraic extension relation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 29-Jul-2023.)
